tidbits.title: Kingdom of Tonga
tidbits.description: Tonga is the only remaining monarchy in the Pacific and is often referred to as the 'Friendly Islands' due to the warm hospitality of its people.

tidbits.title: Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: The country has a rich cultural heritage, expressed through dance, music, traditional crafts, and ceremonies, preserving Polynesian traditions.

tidbits.title: Scenic Beauty
tidbits.description: Tonga's scenic beauty includes pristine beaches, coral reefs, and stunning landscapes. The Ha'apai and Vava'u islands offer incredible diving and whale-watching opportunities.
